post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Responsibilities: Ensure proactive, efficient & effective support of production systems. Timely delivery of high quality enhancements, modifications & technical problem resolutions. Work very closely with business clients to understand business requirements & priorities. Continuously review & improve internal processes like incident/change management, service request management, etc. Develop & maintain knowledge of mainframe technologies & architectures. Provide technical coaching & mentoring to other team members. Proactive problem management. Provide on-call support.

We encourage job-seekers to make the best use of their search time, so we ask that you please not apply to this posting unless you have the mandatory skills and experience (and are currently able to legally work in Canada). Thank you!]

Mandatory Skills/Exp.:
1. Mark IV programming experience (a MUST-HAVE)
2. Strong exp. in mainframe specifically: COBOL, UMBRELLA, DB2, TSO, JCI CICS, ISPF.
2. Excellent customer service focus.
3. Excellent problem solving skills.
4. Strong organization & planning skills.

Assets:
1. Exposure to or knowledge of client server technologies
2. Knowledge of Finance & Insurance business


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 50,000.00 to CAD 60,000.00 per year
Bonus program in effect.
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: 7CY-6K-MW  

Contact Information
Marcia Walter
marcia@gsigroup.com
GSI International Consulting Group
ON
post.title: Mark IV Programmer/Analyst
